Class Notation

java.lang.Object
utils.Notation
public class Notation extends Object
A class to create algebraic notation of the moves in chess

      public static String classicNotation(Piece piece, boolean capture, boolean check, boolean enP, int oldX)
      The default notation of a move
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece moved
      capture - If the piece captured another
      check - If the piece put the enemy king in check
      enP - If the it was a enPassant or not
      oldX - The ancient position in x of the piece
      Returns:
      The notation of the move
